document.full_text: crews on the mediterranean are being urged to watch for unseaworthy vessels carrying migrants from libya after a ship with 600 people broke up off the port of tripoli on friday.
document.title: u.n. urges ships to help migrants in mediterranean
lines_and_colors: crews on the mediterranean are being urged to watch for unseaworthy vessels carrying migrants from libya after a ship with 600 people broke up off the port of tripoli on friday.
